content: I love my Apple Watch a little too much; and I can and have written apps for watchOS; I have never bothered to release or even more worryingly for those that might Only develop for the watch, I do not install third party apps at all really. Right now I think I have one or maybe two at most! If a developer won’t install apps I wonder who actually will! The same issue exists on a smaller scale on the iPhone – how many of you know people that never install anything (well maybe Facebook or snapchat) and then forget their Apple ID or iTunes password and never use their smart phone “smartly” it’s more to show off that you have one… even getting some less savvy people to read my Apple news publications is way too hard for some / not sure if it can be improved or it’s just that some people don’t really use things or “play with them”.
